page.title: 11RICHMOND PARK
page.content: {Richmond Park}is 2,500 acres of grassland,woodland and cultivated gardens. It has 11 gates altogether,6 carriage gates and 5 foot gates.There are many herds of deer in the Park.These are made up of Red deer and Fallow deer. Some parts are enclosed specially for cultivation. These places are gardens which have flowers in various patterns and long straight hedges.Other enclosed areas are the homes of various game birds and animals. The{Isabella Plantation}is an enclosed garden of trees,bushes,ponds and bridged streams.It is exceptionally beautiful when the azaleas are in full bloom.{Pembrook {Lodge}is a historic house which has now been converted into tea rooms overlooking the Park.There are several car parks around the Park.
